file_content.text: The Republic owes you a debt it can never repay. I'll make sure your name is always remembered.
Lieutenant, get me Republic High Command! Captain, I want six squads prepped for a high-speed shuttle assault! Somebody get these blasted gawkers out of my way!
I believe I have something you need, General.
I've got something for you.
If I had a credit for every time a woman promised me that... hold on, what are you carrying?
Terrific. Drop it off on your way out the door. Wait, belay that....
Guess you don't want this old astrogation computer, huh?
Oh, you don't want this?
What? What did you just say? Let me see that thing....
I'm no gawker, idiot. Look what I've brought you.
Shut up and listen.
Did you actually just call me an idiot? I should have you... wait....
Well, I'll be hung with the Chancellor's shorts. You've got the astrogation computer from the Jedi Temple ruins! I was mobilizing half the Republic army to go after it.
You honored my squad by getting that device here and made me as happy as a bantha on the beach.
Do you have any idea what that device is? What it can do?
Sort of. It's an astrogation computer.
It's a computer.
That's the understatement of the decade.
Something you and the Empire were willing to kill over.
Something important.
Absolutely. In the wrong hands, those astrogation coordinates would be a terrible weapon.
The computer contains secret hyperspace routes the Jedi shared with the Republic military decades ago.
The Empire gets their hands on those hyperspace routes, and they could ambush every ship in our fleet.
I had no idea it was that important.
I didn't know.
If you hadn't shown up when you did, the Empire would have this and we'd be eyeball-deep in scrag.
Yes, but the Empire failed. The Force was with us, General.
The Force was with us.
Been a while since I heard those words. I've missed them.
The Empire is not destined to win this war.
It was not their fate.
I'll let you trust in destiny, Jedi. Personally, I prefer power armor and a good auto-cannon.
Those hyperspace routes could come in handy for me.
I could use that info myself.
If you're looking for shortcuts through the Rimma trade lane, you'll be disappointed. These are military patrol routes, and they need to stay secret.
You can always count on Havoc Squad, General.
Just doing my part.
You're the new leader of Havoc Squad? Blasted good to meet you, soldier!
This thing must be worth a lot.
Valuable, eh?
More than you know. Millions--maybe billions--of Republic lives.
Your efforts kept the Republic safe from the Empire--for that, you deserve more'n a clap on the shoulder.
Haven't got a medal, so I guess credits will have to do. I can't make you rich, but I can do something.
Excellent.
Keep your reward. I did this for the Republic.
No need for money.
Then let the Republic do something for you in return. Go on, take the credits. I insist.
That's it?
Don't know, don't care.
Yeah, probably best you don't know anyway.
I don't care why you did this, but I'm glad it's done. I owe you one, so take these credits. The Republic honors its debts.
Thanks.
That's it?
Don't worry, I already deducted your taxes.
Just make sure I get credit.
Oh, your name and picture will go into a file somewhere. I guarantee it.
I'll take that astrogation computer and lock it up tight. You went above and beyond for us. I salute you.
Thanks.
That's it?
Just make sure I get credit.
This is a mission op center. Unless you're part of the mission, you'd better clear out. Now move!
The squad's holocam recorded those scragging Imperials ambushing my men. They killed them all!
Your squad fell in battle, but their mission was a success.
They didn't die for nothing.
I can see that. You must really be something to have chewed through all the Imperials I saw on the holocam.
I spoke with one of your men before he died.
One man was still alive.
Knowing them, his last thoughts were on the mission. They were good soldiers. They'll receive the highest honors for their sacrifice.
So is there a reward for this stupid old computer?
Yeah, sad. So about my reward?
I'm sure we can arrange some financial recognition for your heroic efforts, if that's your concern.
